premise_source_doc_sentence: He was National Security Council Director of West European Affairs  (  1977 -- 1979  )  and then Director of Middle East Affairs  (  1979 -- 1981  )  , throughout the administration of President Jimmy Carter , and United States Ambassador to NATO  (  1993 -- 1998  )  , in the administration of President Bill Clinton , where he was principal architect and negotiator of the post-Cold War `` new NATO '' and of the NATO airstrike decisions that ended the Bosnia War .
